article_title: Friends, family gather to honor Ritzer one year later

article_metadata.author: Terry Date tdate@eagletribune.com

og.description: ANDOVER — A jar of good and simple things written by Colleen Ritzer rekindled memories of her generous spirit at a memorial Mass celebrating the teacher’s enduring influence a year
